> does this mean it is not possible to express "use system roots"?

I'm pretty sure that we explicitly chose to have that *not* be the meaning of empty for client certificate validation, since that would imply that any officially signed client cert in the world is a valid identity for a given cluster instead of selectively choosing.  On the server verification side, it's very important.  On the client verification side, I question its importance and whether we ever supported it.
